content: **sleeveless jumper in karisma ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ size 1/3 6/9 12/18 24 months materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100-150-150-150 g color no 54 light beige brown drops straight needle size 3 5 mm / us 4 and 4 5 mm/us 7 or needle needed to obtain the correct knitting gauge drops wooden button no 513 3 pcs knitting gauge 20 sts x 26 row on needles size 4 5 mm / us 7 with karisma in stockinette sts = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b11&d_id=24
